A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: ABSOLUTELY LOVED IT. \nI don't understand the miserable\, snobby reviews. But then\, I'm from the team that just went to the movies to have an enjoyable\, fun few hours of escapism\, not to politically\, cynically analyze every teeny tiny crumb. \nWatch it. Make up your own mind. I promise\, it's worth it.
